twitter.title: Frisbie's restraint use among highest in U.S.: Attributed to facility's number of patients in specialized Geropsychiatry unit
twitter.description: ROCHESTER — Frisbie Memorial Hospital's use of physical restraints for psychiatric patients is one of the highest in the nation, according to a report recently released by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). The amount of time that psychiatric patients typically spend in restraints at Frisbie was ranked number five in the country.
